DOC.brief_summary: This study Phase II project University Arizona Center Integrative Medicine ( AzCIM ) . Collaborating AzCIM Health Outcomes Pharmacoeconomics ( HOPE ) Center RAND Corporation , Inc . Phase II prospective evaluation clinical cost effectiveness ( outcome ) integrative medicine professional practice model adult primary care delivery ( University Arizona Integrative Health Center - UAIHC Phoenix , AZ ) . Data gather eligible consent member UAIHC . In addition , fidelity evaluation ass whether practice model implement plan . The specific aim : 1 ) Recruit , consent , enroll sample eligible patient staff participant UAIHC ; 2 ) Conduct outcome evaluation UAIHC care use patient data medical record abstraction , self-report assessment , clinic administrative service utilization/encounter data , health insurance claim data ; , 3 ) Conduct fidelity evaluation implementation UAIHC model describe business plan use patient- staff-reported fidelity assessment , random chart audit , abstract clinic administrative data . Participants . 1 ) Participants clinic patient population clinical cost outcome track ( n=500 ) ; 2 ) Clinic patient fidelity data collect ( n=180 ) ; , 3 ) Clinic personnel fidelity data also collect ( n=14 ) . Data Collection . For outcomes evaluation , data collect baseline ( initial clinic visit ) , 3- , 6- , 12-month follow period . Sources include clinical symptom biomarkers medical record abstraction ; patient report outcomes satisfaction questionnaire ; clinic service encounter log ; , cost data health insurance claim information clinic financial data . For fidelity evaluation , data collect monthly 6 month study start , quarterly next 6 month , semi-annually . Patient data fidelity gather single randomize day week use self-administered patient feedback questionnaire . For personnel , fidelity data collect interval use self-administered provider perception questionnaire inter-professional team integrative medical care . Data audit randomly select patient chart administrative record also use .
DOC.brief_title: IMPACT - Integrative Medicine PrimAry Care Trial
DOC.criteria: Outcomes Study Sample : Enrollment primary care ( member ) UAIHC ; Adults age 18 old . Currently pregnant time recruitment ; Patients attend UAIHC clinic consultationonly patient ; Significant cognitive impairment extent individual unable understand consent respond questionnaire . Fidelity Study Sample ( Patients ) : Enrollment primary care ( member ) UAIHC ; Adults age 18 older . Significant cognitive impairment extent individual unable understand consent respond questionnaire . Fidelity Study Sample ( Providers ) : All clinical support personnel .
